snippet: Thousands of homes were renovated using drywall from China, which is claimed to have emitted troubling odors, caused appliances to not work and brought on health problems.
abstract: Decisions in state and federal courts involving Chinese drywall manufacturer Taishan Gypsum could signal a turning point for thousands of American homeowners who claim the drywall emits troubling odors and causes illness; cases have moved slowly due to the complexities of suing a manufacturer from China.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of homes were renovated using drywall from China, which is claimed to have emitted troubling odors, caused appliances to not work and brought on health problems.

headline.seo: Chinese Drywall Lawsuits at a Turning Point
headline.main: Turning Point for Suits Over Chinese Drywall
